rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了先天免疫细胞在结核感染早期阶段的作用，这一作用此前未被认识到匹兹堡大学疫苗研究中心今天在《实验医学杂志》上发表的一项新研究描述了一类免疫细胞在结核病 (TB) 感染早期阶段的一个先前未被认识到的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Study-reveals-previously-unappreciated-role-for-innate-immune-cells-in-early-stages-of-TB-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Study-reveals-previously-unappreciated-role-for-innate-immune-cells-in-early-stages-of-TB-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f3909fb-9b3e-46d2-8ec6-928178b7d2aa Mon, 16 Oct 2023 15:19:24 -0400 Study reveals previously unappreciated role for innate immune cells in early stages of TB infection
两种“重磅”抗生素对肾脏的影响可能比之前想象的更安全根据范德比尔特大学医学中心领导的一项随机试验，两种被认为会导致严重细菌感染的 ICU 患者肾衰竭的“大枪”抗生素，尤其是与另一种抗生素联合使用时，可能比之前报道的对肾脏更安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Two-big-gun-antibiotics-may-be-safer-for-the-kidneys-than-previously-thought.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Two-big-gun-antibiotics-may-be-safer-for-the-kidneys-than-previously-thought.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b9e543ec-63b6-4e2f-879e-44201ab6ec06 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 15:14:30 -0400 Two 'big gun' antibiotics may be safer for the kidneys than previously thought
研究强调需要对行为问题进行早期干预一项为期六年的研究分析了包含 25 个问题的筛查工具的数据，发现了令人震惊的证据，表明受低收入和其他社会压力因素影响的家庭早在 2 岁时就开始出现不健康的行为轨迹。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Study-highlights-need-for-early-intervention-for-behavioral-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Study-highlights-need-for-early-intervention-for-behavioral-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1895de9-4bb1-4a63-a964-f3d762bf56cf Mon, 16 Oct 2023 15:10:31 -0400 Study highlights need for early intervention for behavioral problems
研究人员发现新的生物标志物来预测损伤后神经元的再生神经元是构成我们大脑和脊髓的主要细胞，是受伤后再生最慢的细胞之一，许多神经元无法完全再生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Researchers-identify-new-biomarker-to-predict-neuronal-regenesis-after-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Researchers-identify-new-biomarker-to-predict-neuronal-regenesis-after-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51fb6dd4-8ff6-4429-81d4-858e56bde578 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 15:06:13 -0400 Researchers identify new biomarker to predict neuronal regeneration after injury
医疗补助对于患有唐氏综合症的成年人的健康和福祉发挥着至关重要的作用美国唐氏综合症患者的预期寿命大幅增加，从 20 世纪 50 年代的 4 岁增加到 2019 年的 57 岁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Medicaid-plays-ritic-role-in-the-health-and-well-being-of-adults-with-Down-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Medicaid-plays-ritic-role-in-the-health-and-well-being-of-adults-with-Down-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89b3f783-ad1e-461e-8b1d-3853f0233c0e Mon, 16 Oct 2023 15:02:05 -0400 Medicaid plays critical role in the health and well-being of adults with Down syndrome
莫菲特癌症中心研究人员发现 ROS1 抑制剂 lorlatinib 的隐藏靶点靶向抗癌药物因其能够抑制参与癌症发展的特定蛋白质而被广泛使用，并且与化疗药物相比副作用更少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Moffitt-Cancer-Center-researchers-identify-hidden-target-of-ROS1-inhibitor-lorlatinib.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Moffitt-Cancer-Center-researchers-identify-hidden-target-of-ROS1-inhibitor-lorlatinib.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3da14908-0c3f-4a79-994a-584c6d75f456 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 14:56:06 -0400 Moffitt Cancer Center researchers identify hidden target of ROS1 inhibitor lorlatinib
研究人员创造了更好的复杂癌症 3D 建模新方法由跨学科研究人员组成的国际团队成功创建了一种更好的复杂癌症 3D 建模方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Researchers-create-new-method-for-better-3D-modeling-of-complex-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Researchers-create-new-method-for-better-3D-modeling-of-complex-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e85f4787-a3ed-451e-bda4-80a2d87a5e5d Mon, 16 Oct 2023 14:48:51 -0400 Researchers create new method for better 3D modeling of complex cancers
专家敦促人们了解鲜为人知的乳腺癌症状俄亥俄州立大学综合癌症中心 (Arthur G.詹姆斯癌症医院和理查德 J. 索洛夫研究所 (OSUCCC – 詹姆斯)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Experts-urge-people-to-be-aware-of-lesser-known-breast-cancer-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Experts-urge-people-to-be-aware-of-lesser-known-breast-cancer-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3150144-5d68-46fb-9af5-8506cda887bb Mon, 16 Oct 2023 14:44:01 -0400 Experts urge people to be aware of lesser-known breast cancer symptoms
科学家发现与细菌致病性有关的关键酶革兰氏阴性细菌在植物和动物中引起多种传染病。沙门氏菌和大肠杆菌感染的爆发因其严重性而经常成为头条新闻，人们不得不诉诸对抗疗法和自然疗法，这增加了医疗保健系统的负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Scientists-uncover-key-enzymes-involved-in-bacterial-pathogenicity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Scientists-uncover-key-enzymes-involved-in-bacterial-pathogenicity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa56f047-a80f-42bd-88c0-33d7923b524d Mon, 16 Oct 2023 14:37:23 -0400 Scientists uncover key enzymes involved in bacterial pathogenicity
研究发现活疫苗接种对于儿科器官移植受者来说是安全的根据 2023 年 10 月 12 日发表在《美国医学会杂志》网络公开版上的一项新研究，发现为之前接受过肝脏或肾脏移植的儿童接种活疫苗是安全的，并能促进免疫反应，以预防多种危及生命的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Live-vaccinations-found-to-be-safe-for-pediatric-organ-transplant-recipients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Live-vaccinations-found-to-be-safe-for-pediatric-organ-transplant-recipients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59ada0d7-fa83-4c5b-aba1-7c366a1ba206 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 14:31:28 -0400 Live vaccinations found to be safe for pediatric organ transplant recipients
